description:
Supreme Kai Gowasu is in grave danger! Now that gods are involved, Zamasu’s treachery isn’t a mortal matter anymore. Beerus will have to take matters into his own hands.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beschütze den Kaioshin Gowasu! – Und zerstöre Zamasu!
Kaioushin Gowasu o Mamore: Zamasu o Hakai Seyo!
Protect Supreme Kai Gowasu: Destroy Zamasu!
界王神ゴワスを守れ ザマスを破壊せよ!
